text: Was this ever updated? We are looking for a way to get pages below a parent, like a menu but with more possibilities. Like to create overview pages. like categories with subcategories and in the end detail pages for products. It would be nice if in the overview pages the links to sub categories are automatically added when a sub page is created.
looks a bit like its done with blogpost.

Hubl needs a way to get normal pages in a listing, dynamically made based on a query or tags or even menu. that way you could easy create dynamic list pages. with a normal cms-page template. Blogs are not the way, to create a team members page or maybe another non blog listing. And editing a list page every time a team member detail page is created, is very error sensitive.
